programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Part two of two. The Chameleon's planted clues lead the team on a wild goose chase as it searches for NSA agent Mike Atley, who the criminal claims to have in his custody. Callen is faced with a difficult decision when he is told to release the Chameleon in order to save Atley's life, and contemplates subduing his nemesis once and for all. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: Framed for Murder: A Fixer Upper Mystery
programme.desc: Premiere. Small-town restoration company boss Shannon Hughes is called into help renovate a 19th-century home, only for a neighbouring resident to wind up dead. Suspecting foul play, Shannon teams up with a handsome client to turn amateur sleuth, making use of her expertise in period property to get to the bottom of the crime. Light-hearted mystery, starring Jewel Kilcher and Colin Ferguson.(n)

programme.title: 5 News at 5
programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: Neighbours
programme.desc: Paige and Jack are grateful for Lauren's help in their time of need, Xanthe searches for answers, while a degree of awkwardness lingers between Aaron and David.(n)

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: Ash and Kat collect Luc from VJ, but Patrick seems uncomfortable with the baby around, while Buddy the dog swallows the drugs that Zannis had given to Brody to sell.(n)

programme.title: 5 News Tonight
programme.desc: A round-up of the evening's headlines, including coverage of the latest national and international stories.(n)

programme.title: Party Election Broadcast
programme.desc: A party election broadcast by the Conservative Party for the general election on Thursday.(n)

programme.title: MotoGP Highlights
programme.desc: The Italian Grand Prix. Action from the sixth round of the season at the Mugello Circuit, where Jorge Lorenzo was victorious last year. Lorenzo is already well down the standings following a poor start to the campaign, with fellow Spaniard Maverick Vinales at the top of the leaderboard after five races.(n)

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.desc: Peter Wright tries to save the life of a cow whose uterus prolapsed while calving. Elsewhere, Julian Norton goes head-to-head with a 300kg boar named Donald, who does not want to part with his dangerous tusks. Back at the practice, some of the team have an unenviable task when 13 ferrets are brought in.(n)

programme.title: Our Dream Hotel
programme.desc: New series. Alex Polizzi comes to the aid of hoteliers who are just starting out in the hospitality industry. Her first port of call is an imposing Victorian mansion in the Orkneys which has been bought by the Hodgson family from Brighton, who hope to have completed renovations in time for the tourist season - but are having to do a lot of the work themselves, despite lacking experience.(n)

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Highlights from launch night as a new group of hopefuls entered the house and started to get to know each other better. This season Big Brother has brought together an eclectic group of individuals to represent modern Britain - so whether they get on or clash is anyone's guess.(n)

programme.title: Big Brother's Bit on the Side
programme.desc: Rylan Clark-Neal and his guests discuss how the Big Brother housemates are getting on after their first day in front of the cameras.(n)

programme.title: Shock Docs
programme.desc: One-off documentary exploring some of Britain's most bizarre parent-child relationships, where the mums and dads will do anything to look better than their kids. Those featured include 39-year-old Georgina, who was once a frumpy mum but has now followed daughter Kayla by becoming the image of a Barbie doll, complete with fake boobs and lips. Forty-five-year-old Paul is constantly muscling in on the action with his 18-year-old bodybuilder son Kyle, and former glamour model Charmaine loves flaunting what she has, much to the embarrassment of 14-year-old Yasmin. But when she decides to go back to modelling, how will her daughter react?.(n)

programme.title: SuperCasino
programme.desc: Viewers get the chance to take part in live interactive gaming, with an entertaining mix of roulette-wheel spins and lively chat from the presenting team. Featuring a variety of prizes and promotions.(n)

programme.title: Wentworth Prison
programme.desc: Simmo tells Bea that Brayden has put out a contract on her, and when three new prisoners arrive in Wentworth, she becomes convinced one of them will try to kill her. She is particularly suspicious of transgender inmate Maxine and does her best to avoid her, but when an attack takes place in the showers, the would-be assassin is someone totally unexpected. Drama, starring Danielle Cormack, Socratis Otto and Georgia Chara.(n)

programme.title: Now That's Funny
programme.desc: A collection of internet-sourced videos with a family friendly hook, including people fooling around at work and a glimpse of what Batman is like at home.(n)

programme.title: House Doctor
programme.desc: Ann Maurice offers advice to a bachelor having trouble selling his home in Knutsford, Cheshire, telling him to tone down its resolutely masculine decor and add a few softer touches.(n)

programme.title: Divine Designs
programme.desc: Paul Binski chronicles the history of Britain's religious art, examining the legacies of two wealthy industrialists of the 17th and 18th centuries who demonstrated a flamboyant taste for kitsch in the baroque forms of churches in Great Witley, Worcestershire, and London's Little Stanmore.(n)

programme.title: Wildlife SOS
programme.desc: The work of volunteers treating sick, injured and orphaned animals at a wildlife sanctuary.(n)

programme.title: Lily's Driftwood Bay
programme.desc: Gull and Lily become stranded at sea, and Lily takes charge of the boat as Salty tries to guide them safely back to shore.(n)

programme.title: Mofy
programme.sub-title: A Simple Sunshine Can Make You Happy.
programme.desc: The rabbit looks for her friends so that she can play, but they are all busy doing other things.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Madame Gazelle takes the gang on a trip to the mountains.(n)

programme.title: Little Princess
programme.desc: The youngster wants to redecorate her bedroom, but cannot decide what colour paint to use.(n)

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: Garby the goat is stuck on a cliff edge, but when Ryder tries to rescue him he gets stranded too.(n)

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: The team is asked to build a wind farm to power the Sea Life Centre. However, Scoop becomes overambitious and causes damage to some of the turbines. Animated antics with the friendly handyman and his hard-working pals.(n)

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: Norman causes havoc on Mother's Day when he gives Dilys a very unsafe candle holder as a present.(n)

programme.title: Thomas & Friends
programme.desc: Thomas is excited at being asked to deliver new beehives to Farmer Trotter.(n)

programme.title: Shimmer and Shine
programme.desc: Zac wishes up a cool new carpet, but Zeta gets her hands on it first.(n)

programme.title: Noddy: Toyland Detective
programme.sub-title: Noddy and the Case of the Disappearing Rainbow.
programme.desc: Somebody is causing all the accidents in Toyland, and Noddy tries to find out who before something gets broken for good.(n)

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: A flying saucer crashes on Farmer Yumi's land, and the pups help the pilot to return to his own planet.(n)

programme.title: Ben and Holly's Little Kingdom
programme.desc: The fairy loses her magic wand, so Ben uses his elf skills to find it.(n)

programme.title: Digby Dragon
programme.desc: When Chips catches a shell in his fishing net, he's certain he's actually found a Sea Nut. He's determined to keep it - until the shell starts travelling around by itself.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: The family goes on a picnic, where Peppa and George find a pond and feed the ducks.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Mummy and Daddy Pig find an old box in the attic that is full of musical instruments.(n)

programme.title: Wissper
programme.desc: Herbert the shire horse seems to have lost his strength, so Wissper calls in Dan the panda for a second opinion on what is wrong.(n)

programme.title: Wanda and the Alien
programme.sub-title: Now You See Me, Now You Don't.
programme.desc: The little rabbit, Alien, her brothers and sisters, and the squirrels and ducks all play a big game of hide-and-seek.(n)

programme.title: The Wright Stuff
programme.desc: Matthew Wright and his guests talk about the issues of the day, with viewers calling in to offer their opinions.(n)

programme.title: The Hotel Inspector
programme.desc: Alex Polizzi visits The Black Bear Hotel, a coaching inn in Wareham, Dorset, run by first-time hotelier Lynda Maytum and her family. Three years in, the business is losing money and reviews are shockingly bad, so the hotel is rigged with cameras to give the Hotel Inspector the chance to see the management at work. However, when Alex fills the hotel with some surprise guests and their stay turns to chaos, she is forced to close the establishment down and demonstrate how an inn should be run.(n)

programme.title: 5 News Lunchtime
programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Highlights from launch night as a new group of hopefuls entered the house and started to get to know each other better. This season Big Brother has brought together an eclectic group of individuals to represent modern Britain - so whether they get on or clash is anyone's guess.(n)

programme.title: Access
programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip.(n)

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: Hunter and Olivia's attempts to cheer up VJ backfire, Roo tells James she is keeping the baby, while Kat admits to Marilyn she is having trouble with Luc living in her home.(n)

programme.title: Neighbours
programme.desc: Toadie plays a final desperate card by arranging for someone to try to persuade Sonya to rebuild their broken family. Steph discovers Leo's intention for Sonya's nursery.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A US Marine is murdered, but it is not long before the prime suspect is also found dead. Tim and Abby discover a clue to both killings in an e-mail that suggests the victims were involved in a game with deadly consequences. Drama, starring Sean Murray and Pauley Perrette.(n)

programme.title: A Deadly Affair
programme.desc: Suspecting her husband Charlie of having an affair, author Mary trails him to the house he has been renovating, only to find his dead body. As she is having her own fling, Mary becomes the lead suspect in her spouse's murder. Thriller, starring Valerie Azlynn, Austin Highsmith and Luke Edwards. Edited for daytime violence.(n)

programme.title: 5 News at 5
programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: Neighbours
programme.desc: Toadie plays a final desperate card by arranging for someone to try to persuade Sonya to rebuild their broken family. Steph discovers Leo's intention for Sonya's nursery.(n)

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: Hunter and Olivia's attempts to cheer up VJ backfire, Roo tells James she is keeping the baby, while Kat admits to Marilyn she is having trouble with Luc living in her home.(n)

programme.title: 5 News Tonight
programme.desc: A round-up of the evening's headlines, including coverage of the latest national and international stories.(n)

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Jenno and Bucko race to assist when Jim is rammed by a runaway driver, while Dan and Gordy have to resort to physical force on a drunk who is menacing a family. Armed officers descend in numbers following reports of a gun on the motorway, and a have-a-go hero helps to tackle a runaway drug driver.(n)

programme.title: GPs: Behind Closed Doors
programme.desc: A patient visits the surgery for treatment for a cyst in his ear, but doctors soon discover that he is also struggling with his mental health and offer their support. Meanwhile, a young boy and his worried mother are rushed to A&E after doctors fear a seemingly simple case of tummy ache could actually be a sign of appendicitis.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: In Staffordshire agents try to collect nearly £2,500 in unpaid parking fines, while officers Matt and Gary head to the West Midlands to recover £4,500 owed from a debtor to his former girlfriend. Elsewhere, agents travel to south east London looking to collect £3,000 owed by a taxi company.(n)

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Highlights of the new housemates' first full day at the mercy of Big Brother, and if previous years are anything to go by, they will no doubt all be out to make a good impression on each other and the voting public.(n)

programme.title: Big Brother's Bit on the Side
programme.desc: Rylan Clark-Neal presents the BB companion show, including a debate on the burning issues, celebrity guests' thoughts on the latest developments and behind-the-scenes insights.(n)

programme.title: We Were Soldiers
programme.desc: Mel Gibson stars in this fact-based Vietnam drama as Lt Col Hal Moore, commander of the First Battalion, Seventh Cavalry, assigned to action in the Drang Valley. Soon, he and his men are cornered in a tiny area by more than 2,000 Viet-Cong and engaged in a fight to the death. Randall Wallace's visceral film also stars Greg Kinnear, Barry Pepper and Marc Blucas(n)

programme.title: Embarazados
programme.desc: In this comedy, a seemingly perfect couple's relationship is tested when they undergo fertility treatment(n)

programme.title: The Flight of the Phoenix
programme.desc: Robert Aldrich's tense and exciting thriller about air crash survivors who are finally forced to try and build a single-engine aircraft from the wreckage of their plane in order to escape from their crash-site in the north African desert(n)

programme.title: Paper Towns
programme.desc: A nerdy teenager falls for the enigmatic girl next door, who vanishes after the two have an adventure together one night. She leaves behind a trail of clues, which lead him and his friends to go on a road trip to find her(n)

programme.title: The Soloist
programme.desc: A Los Angeles journalist befriends a homeless Juilliard-trained musician, while looking for a new article for the paper(n)

programme.title: Auto Focus
programme.desc: Sordid true story of Bob Crane, the star of 60s TV series Hogan's Heroes. After meeting video expert John, Crane swaps family life and church for casual sex(n)

programme.title: The 33
programme.desc: Based on a true event, the film follows the 2010 mining disaster incident where a group of thirty-three miners were trapped inside the San Jose mine in Chile for more than two months after a gold and copper mine collapses(n)

programme.title: The Fast and the Furious
programme.desc: High-octane action thriller, starring Paul Walker as an undercover cop who infiltrates a subculture of Los Angeles street racers while investigating a hijacking ring. But he soon questions his loyalties when the street racers become the prime suspects(n)

programme.title: Johnson Family Vacation
programme.desc: The Johnsons set out from California for a family reunion in Missouri. The parents are split up, the kids are arguing - can everyone keep it together for the big day?(n)

programme.title: Trainwreck
programme.desc: A commitment-phobic binge drinker living in New York City must reevaluate her feelings about intimate relationships when a sports doctor pursues a romance with her. Meanwhile, she must make some hard decisions about her ailing father's long-term care(n)

programme.title: Dave Chappelle's Block Party
programme.desc: In September 2004, comedian Dave Chappelle took a break from his immensely successful Comedy Central show to stage a free, unpublicized, all-star hip-hop concert in the Clinton Hill neighborhood of Brooklyn, NY. Inviting fans over the Internet, on the street, and even in his family's hometown of Yellow Springs, OH, Chappelle asked filmmaker Michel Gondry to document the event from its inception on through to the performances themselves. The result is Dave Chappelle's Block Party, a concert film that provides not only a sampling of the music on display that September, but also an intimate look at the comedian himself. Gondry's cameras tag along with Chappelle as he visits Ohio, recruits a university marching band to play at the show, and surveys the opinions of Clinton Hill on the show that's about to take place. Along the way, we're introduced to some the comedian's favorite acts, in rehearsals and on-stage: Dead Prez, Jill Scott, Mos Def, the Roots, Erykah Badu, Kanye West, and the surprise reuniting of the Fugees(n)

programme.title: The Ninth Gate
programme.desc: Eerie saga about a rare-book buyer who becomes a target of unknown forces when he's asked to find a volume about the Devil(n)

programme.title: Ramona
programme.desc: An elderly woman who announces she is ready to die has second thoughts after her family members begin to make preparations(n)

programme.title: Midnight Cowboy
programme.desc: NaÏve Texan Joe Buck drifts to New York and, with the help of local wheeler-dealer Enrico 'Ratso' Rizzo, tries to make a living as a gigolo. Drama(n)

programme.title: Chasing Papi
programme.desc: An executive romances three women from three different cities in this lively but contrived farce. Eduardo Verastegui, Roselyn Sanchez. Sheila E., Paul Rodriguez and Maria Conchita Alonso have small roles. Linda Mendoza directed(n)

programme.title: Life or Something like It
programme.desc: Romantic comedy about a reporter whose life is turned upside down when she interviews a psychic for an article about a sports result and he tells her she has just seven days to live. Immediately, she starts to rethink her life, including her high-flying career and relationship with a baseball star(n)

programme.title: Fierce People
programme.desc: Actor-turned-director and producer Griffin Dunne (Practical Magic, Addicted to Love) teams up with scenarist Dirk Wittenborn for the slice-of-life ensemble drama Fierce People. As summer encroaches, 16-year-old Manhattanite Finn Earl (Anton Yelchin) would love nothing more than to trek off to South America and spend the year's sun-drenched months near the equator, embarking on thrilling adventures with his estranged archaeologist father, whom he's never met. Alas, the bonds of family rein in tight when Finn's booze- and coke-addled mother, the masseuse Liz (Diane Lane), cries out for help -- and, in the process, unwittingly gets Finn arrested. In a dramatic attempt to reverse circumstances and sort out the complications in both of their lives, Liz insists on taking custody of Finn for the summer. Both, she insists, will live in the home of one of her former massage clients, the aging billionaire Ogden C. Osborne (Donald Sutherland) -- with whom she may be amorously involved. Though Finn agrees begrudgingly at first, in time he finds the environment welcoming -- as he develops a crush on Ogden's gorgeous granddaughter (Kristen Stewart) and befriends Ogden's grandson. But when an unforeseen and shocking act of violence erupts, it estranges Finn and Liz from their posh surroundings and provides a sobering, harrowing reminder of the socioeconomic differences between the Earls and their new friends(n)

programme.title: Sisters
programme.desc: Two daffy adult sisters throw one last raging party in their childhood home before it's sold by their parents, with disastrous results(n)

programme.title: The Dead Pool
programme.desc: Classic cop action with the legendary Clint in one of his greatest roles as 'Dirty' Harry Callahan. Harry investigates an underground group who seem to be killing famous faces. Dir: Buddy Van Horn(n)

programme.title: Death Race
programme.desc: In the near future, professional racer Jensen Ames is set up for a crime he didn't commit and forced to take part in a deadly demolition derby to win his freedom(n)

programme.title: The Mummy: Tomb of the Dragon Emperor
programme.desc: The third entry in the popular pulp-adventure series finds Rick O'Connell and wife, Evelyn, in 1940s China with their now-adult son, Alex. Together they battle a centuries-old Chinese emperor and his undead army(n)

programme.title: Charlie Wilson's War
programme.desc: Based on the true story of how Charlie Wilson, an alcoholic womaniser and Texas congressman, persuaded the CIA to train and arm resistance fighters in Afghanistan to fend off the Soviet Union. With the help of rogue CIA agent, Gust Avrakotos, the two men supplied money, training and a team of military experts that turned the ill-equipped Afghan freedom-fighters into a force that brought the Red Army to a stalemate and set the stage for conflicts in the Middle East that still rage to this day(n)

programme.title: Shattered Glass
programme.desc: Before Jayson Blair made headlines for his plagiarized New York Times reporting, Stephen Glass defamed the weekly current events magazine The New Republic with a series of eye-catching, entertaining, and completely fabricated stories. Now Glass' trail of lies gets the big-screen treatment in writer/director Billy Ray's Shattered Glass, featuring Hayden Christensen in the title role. The film chronicles Glass' time at the magazine in the late '90s, when his colorful coverage of a hedonistic Young Republican convention, superstar web hackers, and the circus surrounding the Bill Clinton/Monica Lewinsky scandal made him the toast of the publishing world, garnering attention from such national publications as George and Rolling Stone. Barely out of college, the eager Glass ingratiates himself with the office staff, including his mentor, managing editor Michael Kelly (Hank Azaria). But when Kelly is unceremoniously fired and replaced with editor Chuck Lane (Peter Sarsgaard), Glass' pieces come under a greater degree of scrutiny, until one in particular threatens to expose his tall tales to the rest of the world. Based in part on a Vanity Fair article by journalist Buzz Bissinger, Shattered Glass premiered at the Telluride and Toronto film festivals before its limited fall theatrical release(n)

programme.title: Three Kings
programme.desc: As the end of the first Gulf War nears, a group of adventurous American soldiers attempt to find a huge cache of hidden Iraqi gold. Action(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement
programme.desc: When war veteran Colonel Terry Childers is hung out to dry by military chiefs, he turns to an old friend, army lawyer Colonel Hayes Hodges. Drama(n)

programme.title: Bug
programme.desc: This intense and unnerving thriller should make viewers' skin crawl. Ashley Judd stars as an Oklahoma waitress who's battling her own addictive demons. She takes on a whole new set of problems when she gets involved with an unhinged Gulf War vet (Michael Shannon) who's wracked with paranoid delusions involving invasive insects and clandestine military experiments. Directed by William Friedkin and written by Tracy Letts, who adapted his stage play. Harry Connick Jr., Lynn Collins(n)

programme.title: We Were Soldiers
programme.desc: Mel Gibson stars in this fact-based Vietnam drama as Lt Col Hal Moore, commander of the First Battalion, Seventh Cavalry, assigned to action in the Drang Valley. Soon, he and his men are cornered in a tiny area by more than 2,000 Viet-Cong and engaged in a fight to the death. Randall Wallace's visceral film also stars Greg Kinnear, Barry Pepper and Marc Blucas(n)

programme.channel: Crime and Investigation Network HDTV (CI HD)
programme.title: American Justice
programme.sub-title: Crime of Passion: The Pamela Smart Story
programme.desc: Crime of Passion: The Pamela Smart Story. Youth, seduction, and violence populate the landscape of the A&E program American Justice: Crimes of Passion -- The Pamela Smart Story. As an attractive motivated schoolteacher, Pam Smart was carving out a successful middle-class life. But, inwardly, she was passionately dissatisfied. Her husband held her back, yet she couldn't afford to live alone. Then, Smart met teenager Bill Flynn. He fell for her and she seemed flattered by the attention. Eventually, their relationship became intimate and Smart found the answer to all her problems. Through manipulation and claims of abuse, she convinced her young lover to kill her husband and that's just what he did with the help of two friends. But, Smart's calculating manner gave her away when police suspected her of being less than grief-stricken. What followed was the first live broadcast trial in history. The media explosion surrounding the case was unparalleled. Smart turned out to be a lot less organized than she thought. When her killers caved and word got around of her arranged hit, she was doomed. A&E takes the viewer back to the original trial of the century(n)

programme.desc: Crime Family. A look at the Genovese clan of New York City, reputed to be one of the most powerful crime families in America. Included: interviews with a godson of patriarch Vito Genovese, reporters, defense attorneys, prosecutors and other law-enforcement officials. Bill Kurtis hosts(n)

programme.channel: Crime and Investigation Network HDTV (CI HD)
programme.title: American Justice
programme.sub-title: Crime of Passion: The Pamela Smart Story
programme.desc: Crime of Passion: The Pamela Smart Story. Youth, seduction, and violence populate the landscape of the A&E program American Justice: Crimes of Passion -- The Pamela Smart Story. As an attractive motivated schoolteacher, Pam Smart was carving out a successful middle-class life. But, inwardly, she was passionately dissatisfied. Her husband held her back, yet she couldn't afford to live alone. Then, Smart met teenager Bill Flynn. He fell for her and she seemed flattered by the attention. Eventually, their relationship became intimate and Smart found the answer to all her problems. Through manipulation and claims of abuse, she convinced her young lover to kill her husband and that's just what he did with the help of two friends. But, Smart's calculating manner gave her away when police suspected her of being less than grief-stricken. What followed was the first live broadcast trial in history. The media explosion surrounding the case was unparalleled. Smart turned out to be a lot less organized than she thought. When her killers caved and word got around of her arranged hit, she was doomed. A&E takes the viewer back to the original trial of the century(n)

programme.title: Animals in Love
programme.desc: Liz Bonnin presents the first of two programmes exploring animal relationships, finding out how they meet, mate and form relationships, and asking whether they can fall in love the same as humans. On her travels, she finds several animals that have discovered the secrets of successful long-lasting relationship, including the bonobo of the Congo, Africa's wild dogs and tamarins in the UK. But there are other sides to the story, like the devoted penguin couple that stayed together for 10 years, only for things to turn out not quite as they seemed. Liz also hears how a Siamaon gibbon dealt with the death of his life partner and meets a pair of elephants with an extraordinary friendship.(n)

programme.title: Monster Bug Wars
programme.desc: A tent spider battles a katydid, a banded huntsman confronts a jungle huntsman and a rhinoceros beetle faces off against a meat ant.(n)

programme.title: Biggest & Baddest
programme.desc: Niall McCann joins gorilla doctors in Uganda's Bwindi Forest to tend to some unwell primates.(n)

programme.title: Wild Canada
programme.desc: A look at pronghorn antelopes, wolverines and beavers in boreal forests and prairies.(n)

programme.title: Yellowstone
programme.desc: Summer returns, transforming the landscape of the famous national park from a frozen wilderness into the ideal environment for newborn animals. programme.title: Wild Justice
programme.desc: Wardens take to the skies in a high-tech aeroplane and coordinate an air-to-ground assault on elusive nocturnal poachers. Working under the cover of night, a fawn killer is located by his roommates, and a felonious poacher puts lives at risk as he uses a bow and arrow to hunt deer in a residential neighbourhood.(n)

programme.title: Reservoir Dogs
programme.desc: The grim, violent tale of a heist gone wrong. Six criminals - all with pseudonyms, and strangers to one another - are hired for a diamond robbery, but they are ambushed by police and forced to shoot their way out. At their warehouse rendezvous, the survivors, realising they were set up, try to find the traitor in their midst as this controversial exploration of betrayal moves inexorably to its blood-soaked climax(n)

programme.title: Kickboxer III: The Art of War
programme.desc: Kickboxer David Sloan returns to compete in an exhibition in Rio. While there, he befriends a young pickpocket and infiltrates an illegal child sex ring when the boy's sister is kidnapped(n)

programme.title: Nick & Norah's Infinite Playlist
programme.desc: Michael Cera and Kat Dennings add charismatic spark to this enjoyable romantic comedy. They play the title characters, a heartsick musician and a young indie-rock fan who asks him to be her boyfriend in an attempt to put off an annoying classmate. What starts out as just a ploy turns into a most memorable and eventful night on the town. Ari Graynor is a blast as Norah's drunken party-hearty pal who winds up getting lost. Alexis Dziena, Aaron Yoo, Jay Baruchel. Directed by Peter Sollett(n)

programme.title: Enchanted
programme.desc: This delightful crowd-pleaser for all ages stars the enchanting Amy Adams as a positively perky princess who is dispatched from her fairy-tale realm by an evil queen (Susan Sarandon) and resurfaces in modern-day Manhattan. She meets a divorced lawyer (Patrick Dempsey) who takes her in while she awaits the arrival of her Prince Charming (James Marsden). Narrated by Julie Andrews. Three of the film's tunes were nominated for the Best Song Oscar. Idina Menzel, Timothy Spall, Rachel Covey(n)

programme.title: Wayne's World
programme.desc: Mike Myers and Dana Carvey play the hosts of Wayne's World, a cult cable show. But slimy TV executive Rob Lowe has plans for the programme and for the babelicious Tia Carrere(n)

programme.title: Jingle All the Way
programme.desc: Harassed businessman Howard tells his little boy he'll buy him a Turboman for Christmas, only to find that every store has sold out. Racing round the shops in search of the last toy, he realises that postman Myron is doing exactly the same thing. Comedy(n)

programme.title: The Black Stallion
programme.desc: Drama following the dawn of supersonic flight in the 1950s and the trials and tribulations of a group of experimental aircraft test pilots. James Garner's screen debut(n)

programme.title: The House Bunny
programme.desc: An ex-Playboy Bunny becomes house mother to a sorority of geeky misfits after she is ousted from the Playboy Mansion. The girls desperately need to attract more members or they will lose their house, but can their new member make them cool without compromising their true selves?(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: Not Exactly How We Planned. Drama about New York City nightclub owner James "Ghost" St Patrick, who doubles as a drug kingpin to an elite clientele, begins with an attack on his illegal business, one that could put a crimp in his legitimate enterprise(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: Whoever He Is. Ghost and Tommy take action against those responsible for the attack on their drug organization, while Ghost's wife deals with her new career and Ghost rekindles a former relationship with an attorney who's been after one of his people(n)

programme.title: The Abyss
programme.desc: The civilian crew of a drilling station are called in to save sailors in a nuclear submarine stuck on the seabed of the Atlantic. But they aren't the only ones interested in the lost sub. Deep sea chiller(n)

programme.title: The Wicker Tree
programme.desc: Horror drama directed by Robin Hardy (The Wicker Man). Two naive American preachers are welcomed by the people of a remote Scottish village, but the pair are soon in mortal danger(n)

programme.title: Rocky
programme.desc: Rocky Balboa is just another journeyman fighter, until champ Apollo Creed gives him a surprise shot at the title. Zero to hero boxing movie(n)

programme.title: Wayne's World
programme.desc: Mike Myers and Dana Carvey play the hosts of Wayne's World, a cult cable show. But slimy TV executive Rob Lowe has plans for the programme and for the babelicious Tia Carrere(n)

programme.title: The Abyss
programme.desc: The civilian crew of a drilling station are called in to save sailors in a nuclear submarine stuck on the seabed of the Atlantic. But they aren't the only ones interested in the lost sub. Deep sea chiller(n)

programme.title: Jaws
programme.desc: A New England seaside town's tourist season is turned into a nightmare by a giant killer shark. The local police chief's efforts to protect the public are thwarted by the greedy mayor, forcing him to join forces with a grizzled fisherman and a marine biologist to hunt and kill the monster predator(n)

programme.title: The Skulls
programme.desc: College senior, Luke McNamara, is invited to join a secret fraternity organisation called 'The Skulls'. At first he is excited by this prospect, but as time passes he realises that the group harbours some sinister secrets..(n)

programme.title: Bolt
programme.desc: The canine action star of a hit TV series, who actually believes he has superpowers, accidentally winds up in New York City and must find his way back to Hollywood, so he recruits a streetwise alley cat and a hero-worshipping hamster for his cross-country trek(n)

programme.title: The Abyss
programme.desc: The civilian crew of a drilling station are called in to save sailors in a nuclear submarine stuck on the seabed of the Atlantic. But they aren't the only ones interested in the lost sub. Deep sea chiller(n)

programme.title: Jaws

The local police chief's efforts to protect the public are thwarted by the greedy mayor, forcing him to join forces with a grizzled fisherman and a marine biologist to hunt and kill the monster predator(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: This Is Real. The future of the club is jeopardized as the rift between Ghost and Tasha intensifies. Later, Ghost fears that his pursuit of Angela could impact his legitimate life and place his family in danger(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: Who Are You. Ghost and Tommy meet with gang leaders as Angela schedules surveillance to monitor the gathering; the mystery assailant returns; and Ghost confesses to Angela that he's married with children(n)

programme.title: Cadillac Records
programme.desc: The story of the blues in 1950s Chicago is told in Sony BMG Film's Cadillac Records, a musical drama written and directed by TV veteran Darnell Martin. The film stars Adrien Brody as Chess Records founder Leonard Chess, with Jeffrey Wright portraying R&B legend Muddy Waters, Cedric the Entertainer as Willie Dixon, Beyoncé Knowles as Etta James, and Mos Def doing his best Chuck Berry(n)

programme.title: Commando
programme.desc: All-action adventure spiced with humour in which a retired Special Forces colonel returns to action when a ruthless South American dictator kidnaps his 11-year-old daughter. Armed to the teeth, he sets out to bring her back, leaving little else in one piece(n)

programme.title: Thick as Thieves
programme.desc: An experienced career thief is set up by a young upstart gangster and the two self-styled criminal masterminds find themselves in a turf battle neither much cares about. The skirmish eventually attracts the attention of a female cop(n)

programme.title: True Lies
programme.desc: A special agent called Harry Tasker skilled in languages and counter intelligence has been leading a double life all his married life. His wife believes that he works for a computer company until she becomes involved with a con artist who likes seducing married women...(n)

programme.title: Spill
programme.desc: Action movie in which a United States Presidential bodyguard risks everything to save the day when a truck full of biological weapons crashes in a National Park(n)

programme.title: Lonesome Dove Church
programme.desc: A pastor must rescue his estranged son, who is wanted for murder and on the run from a posse. They eventually end up in a small town in Texas, where they found a famous church. Tom Berenger stars in this prequel to the Pulitzer Prize-winning series of Western novels by Larry McMurtry(n)

programme.title: The Package
programme.desc: A Seattle mob enforcer must deliver a mysterious package to a former rival, but he finds himself pursued by killers, mercenaries and maniacs while attempting to get the job done(n)

programme.title: Vantage Point
programme.desc: Witnesses to an assassination attempt against the president, including Secret Service agents Kent Taylor (Matthew Fox) and Thomas Barnes (Dennis Quaid), come away with sharply differing impressions of who did what to whom Barnes tries to piece together the shocking truth from the contradictory evidence and accounts. Sigourney Weaver, Forest Whitaker, William Hurt(n)

programme.title: Anaconda
programme.desc: Action adventure about a documentary film crew's encounter with a terrifying 40-foot snake. Searching the Amazon basin for a legendary tribe never before captured on film, the crew fall in with an eccentric boat captain who claims to know the tribe's whereabouts. But instead the man leads them on a nightmare journey in search of a deadly anaconda that is said to inhabit the local waters(n)

programme.title: Spill
programme.desc: Action movie in which a United States Presidential bodyguard risks everything to save the day when a truck full of biological weapons crashes in a National Park(n)

programme.title: True Lies
programme.desc: A special agent called Harry Tasker skilled in languages and counter intelligence has been leading a double life all his married life. His wife believes that he works for a computer company until she becomes involved with a con artist who likes seducing married women...(n)

programme.title: Event Horizon
programme.desc: After disappearing for seven years, revolutionary spaceship Event Horizon is rediscovered. However, the team sent to investigate find that a terrifying, malevolent presence is lurking on board(n)

programme.title: Starship Troopers
programme.desc: In the distant future, high school graduate Johnny Rico joins the military to impress his childhood sweetheart but is soon shipped out to the front lines of a vicious war between mankind and enormous alien bugs(n)

programme.title: True Lies
programme.desc: A special agent called Harry Tasker skilled in languages and counter intelligence has been leading a double life all his married life. His wife believes that he works for a computer company until she becomes involved with a con artist who likes seducing married women...(n)

programme.title: Fortress
programme.desc: A glossy high-tech, futuristic sci-fi exterior does little to conceal the fact that this gory actioner is little more than a cliche-ridden prison movie--a movie that found tremendous popularity internationally. Set amidst an overpopulated, oppressed future U.S., it centers on the struggles of a defiant young couple who decide to have a second baby after the first dies. Unfortunately, the law states that each woman can only have one child. It is irrelevant whether the child survives or not. The couple attempts to make it safely out of the country, but they are captured and sentenced to spend three decades in the dreaded, corporate-owned Fortress, a grim place where lasers replace iron bars and inmates are controlled via radio-operated pain-inflicting intestinal devices. Incorrigible prisoners are forced to have their identities erased by a "mind wipe" machine. The prison is controlled by a sadistic cyborg warden and a robot army. The warden wants to make the woman's baby into a cyborg too. The warden also finds the wife very attractive. Meanwhile the husband begins making friends with his cellmate in hopes of finding a way to disable the surveillance system in time to save his wife and somehow escape(n)

programme.title: Event Horizon
programme.desc: After disappearing for seven years, revolutionary spaceship Event Horizon is rediscovered. However, the team sent to investigate find that a terrifying, malevolent presence is lurking on board(n)

programme.title: Bats
programme.desc: Beware of what goes "bump" (and "squeak" and "flap flap flap") in the night. Dr. Sheila Casper (Dina Meyer) is a respected zoologist dispatched by the government to Gallup, TX, a small community suffering from an unusual number of reported bat attacks. Casper finds this news puzzling, since bats are generally placid creatures who avoid contact with humans. The local sheriff, Emmett Kimsey (Lou Diamond Phillips), assures Casper that the reports are on the level and that something needs to be done about swarms of aggressive bats so thick they blot out the moon. Caspar and Kimsey discover that a new breed of genetically altered bats have escaped from a research facility and taken up residence in a cave near Gallup -- but the nocturnal bloodsuckers have no intention of leaving as quickly as they arrived. Bats was written by John Logan, who had two other projects hit the screen within a few months of Bats' release: Oliver Stone's Any Given Sunday and Ridley Scott's Gladiator. The supporting cast includes Leon and Bob Gunton(n)

programme.title: Rapid Fire
programme.desc: Brandon Lee (son of famed martial-arts film star, Bruce Lee) stars as a young art student who happens to witness a drug murder and is placed in protective custody by federal agents. It's not too long before he realizes that the only real protection he can count on is his own martial-arts training(n)

programme.title: Renaissance
programme.desc: In the labyrinthine streets of 21st century Paris, where every move is monitored and ever action recorded, a mysterious kidnapping sets into motion a catastrophic series of events that could ultimately prove the downfall of civilization. The year is 2054, and the Avalon Corporation has securely woven its way into every aspect of modern living by making youth and beauty the most valued commodity around. Troubles arises in the City of Lights when a high-profile scientist named Ilona (voice of Romola Garai) is kidnapped, and policeman Barthélémy Karas (voice of Daniel Craig) is assigned the task of solving the case. As his investigation leads Karas down a menacing path where death lurks around every bend, he soon discovers that events that took place in 2006 have cast a dark shadow over the future of humankind. A film that mixes Blade Runner aesthetics with stark, Sin City-style visuals, Renaissance was filmed using motion-capture animation and features extravagant production design by Alfred Frazzani (Immortel Ad Vitam)(n)

programme.title: Stripes
programme.desc: Bill Murray has joined the Army, and the Army will never be the same! When John Winger loses his job, his car, his apartment and his grilfriend -all in one day - he decides he has only one option: volunteer for the army. And he talks his friend Russell into enlising with him. Where else, they figure, can they help save the world for democracy....and meet girls! John and Russell find basic training a snap: they are arrested twice, have endless run-ins with their drill sergeant and get into a big mess at a female mud wrestling match. They even steal a top secret government vehicle to take some gorgeous female Mps on a date, and wind up behind the iron curtain. Stripes is outrageous fun!(n)

programme.title: National Treasure: Book of Secrets
programme.desc: In a quest for treasure that involves a missing page from John Wilkes Booth's diary, a team leads to an ancient city of gold(n)

programme.title: Freelancers
programme.desc: 50 cent is a rookie cop, mentored by his father's partner (Robert De Niro), who learns of police corruption and the horrible truth about his dad's death. With Forest Whitaker (2012)(n)

programme.title: Get Shorty
programme.desc: John Travolta headlines this bitingly funny and realistic poke at Hollywood morality. He plays Chili Palmer, a Miami loan shark with mob connections. A great movie buff, he has an almost photographic memory for film trivia. Chili goes to L.A. to collect a huge debt from Harry Zimm (Gene Hackman), a producer of bargain-basement films such as "Grotesque." Although he is supposed to hurt Zimm, the two hit it off after Chili pitches Zimm his new idea for a film. Zimm loves the idea, and the two team up to become co-producers. Chili's invaluable experience with the underworld helps make them Hollywood successes but not before they overcome a few obstacles, including Zimm's scream-queen girlfriend who falls for Chili, her superstar and egomaniacal ex-husband Martin Weir (Danny DeVito), whom the producers are trying to con into starring in the film. They also contend with other underworld characters who are eager for Zimm to pay up his debt. The story is based on author Elmore Leonard's scathing best-seller. Leonard states that Chili Palmer is a real gangster (who has since become a good-guy), but that his Hollywood exploits in the book and film are purely fictional. Palmer did help Leonard research the story though. Look closely in the opening scenes and you can find Chilli Palmer standing to the right of Travolta as he and character Ray "Bones" Barbaroni converse in a restaurant(n)

programme.title: Monk
programme.sub-title: Mr Monk Goes to the Ball Game.
programme.desc: An investigation into the murder of a wealthy executive quickly reveals that the victim may not have been the assassin's intended target. Adrian is led to a baseball game as he gradually pieces the puzzle together. Detective drama, starring Tony Shalhoub.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Jane suspects an inside job when the team is called to a robbery at a jewellery store. After CCTV evidence confirms the involvement of a notorious safe-cracker, the agents discover he owed money to a professional criminal - but just when they think the case is closed, the business owner is taken hostage. Elsewhere, Van Pelt and Rigsby consider the future of their relationship. Crime drama, starring Simon Baker.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: The murder of a trainer at a baseball academy leads Cho, Lisbon and Jane to suspect the crime could have been motivated by money. The team learns his wife is sole beneficiary of a substantial life insurance payout, and his business partner stood to take the controlling share of their company - but a lack of evidence hampers the investigation - until the consultant follows a hunch. Jane also has a flashback when he is knocked out, leading him to remember working at a circus with his father. Guest starring Jude Ciccolella.(n)

programme.title: Leverage
programme.desc: The team infiltrates a Department of Defence research lab in an effort to stop to Damien Moreau killing a brilliant engineer and auctioning off her work to international terrorists. Guest starring Goran Visnjic and Elisabetta Canalis.(n)

programme.title: Leverage
programme.desc: Moreau flees from America, and when Nate and the team give chase, they discover he has taken refuge in San Lorenzo, a former British colony now ruled by a tyrannical president. Discovering their enemy has insinuated himself into the country's government, they are forced to find a new way to bring him to justice.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs goes into his favourite diner for a cup of coffee and finds himself staring down the barrel of a gun, forcing him to question choices he has made in the past and present. The action then flashes back a few days to when he and the rest of the team members were investigating the death of a petty officer on board USS Gentry, which has been undergoing repairs in dry dock. The 200th episode of the crime drama, starring Mark Harmon.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A Navy captain wearing a colourful costume underneath his uniform is shot and killed in a flower shop, and further investigation reveals he was leading a double life as a masked vigilante. Vance brings in Tony's ex-fiancee, journalist Wendy Miller, who claims the victim had been trying to expose a scandal, and as the team pursues the case, a real-estate scam is uncovered. Guest starring Perrey Reeves (Entourage).(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: A couple are murdered on their way to a high-school reunion, prompting Patrick to investigate the untrustworthy characters at the event. He connects the incident to a past case of bullying, and when he notices that Rigsby bears a resemblance to one of the victims, he tries to lure the killer out with an audacious scheme. Crime drama, starring Simon Baker, Robin Tunney and Tim Kang.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: The corpse of a media-relations officer is unearthed at the opening of a new development in Salter, Central Valley. Mayor Melba Shannon blames eco-terrorists for the murder, but the officers later uncover evidence suggesting she herself could be to blame. When Patrick Jane is kidnapped he puts his life in danger by revealing he knows the true identity of the gang's leader. Elsewhere, a reporter films a documentary about Lisbon's unit at CBI HQ. Guest starring Sharon Lawrence (NYPD Blue).(n)

programme.title: Leverage
programme.desc: Nate and the team race to the top of a mountain, where they hope to recover lost evidence crucial to their mission to take down a corrupt financier. However, their expedition is threatened by a gang of hired guns and dangerous weather conditions. Crime drama, starring Timothy Hutton.(n)

programme.title: Leverage
programme.desc: A mark is killed in the middle of one of the team's stings, leaving Nate in the frame for murder. With their colleague's freedom at stake, the con artists are forced to locate the real killer and complete their mission. Crime drama, starring Timothy Hutton.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A Navy reservist is found dead in his home with marks around his neck, and Gibbs and the team discover he was working on a highly classified case for the department of defence. The circumstances surrounding the man's demise lead the investigators to suspect someone was secretly trying to drive him insane, bringing them into contact with Samantha Ryan, the director of a division specialising in psychological warfare. Guest starring Jamie Lee Curtis.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Chief petty officer Leland Wiley dies of a heart attack just as he is about to reveal information on elusive arms dealer Agah Bayar. The team discovers the cardiac arrest was caused by someone hacking into a computer monitoring Wiley's pacemaker and increasing his heart rate to 400bpm. Meanwhile, a probationary agent tries to impress Gibbs and win a place on his team. Crime drama, starring Mark Harmon, with Tamer Hassan and Matt L Jones.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A US Marine Sergeant is found dead in a national park, forcing Gibbs and his team to collaborate with Mounted Police Sergeant May Dawson to solve a string of related crimes.(n)

programme.title: Bull
programme.desc: Benny goes on trial for misconduct in a case related to his work with the District Attorney's office, and Bull teams up with criminal lawyer JP Nunnelly to defend him.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Brian begins a new career as an estate agent after having cosmetic surgery, which gets him in trouble with Quagmire after encouraging his friend to buy a new property.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Brian and Peter go out on a mission to find a new Thanksgiving turkey after they drunkenly consume the whole bird the night before the holiday. Meanwhile, Chris decides to become the man of the house while his father is away.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan takes Hayley to National Gun Association Land after being forced to spend more time with her - but the trip only highlights their differing opinions on weapon control. Meanwhile, Steve becomes convinced he is adopted.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Steve's book makes him famous, leading Stan to become a horrendously pushy `stage parent'. Acquiring an agent, the teenager leaves his family for a life of luxury. Comedy, with the voice of Seth MacFarlane.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Brian wins tickets to a Celine Dion concert in Las Vegas, but as he and Stewie prepare to travel, the tot tries out his new teleportation machine. Stewie believes the machine has not worked, but instead he has accidentally duplicated himself and Brian, with one pair going to the show, and the other transported elsewhere.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.sub-title: No Country Club for Old Men.
programme.desc: Chris hits it off with a well-connected girl called Amanda, who wangles an invitation for the whole family to join the Barrington Country Club - but they end up being thrown out when they revert to type.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Francine decides to hold a party to get to know her neighbours, but Stan becomes suspicious of an Iranian couple. In an attempt to find evidence to support his hunch, he breaks into their house and is thrown into jail. Meanwhile, Steve and Roger cause a power failure, sparking fears of a terrorist attack.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: The church deacon chokes on a communion wafer, prompting Stan to pull out all the stops in a bid to replace him. Meanwhile, Francine rustles up a potato salad for the wake using a secret ingredient provided by Roger, and Steve finds himself falling in love. With the voice of Josh Groban.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Peter helps Joe to publish a book, but things get out of hand when he starts to take on the writing as well. Elsewhere, Brian begins an extreme exercise regime after experiencing a runner's high for the first time.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Peter and Lois go into business together, opening a cookie store. However, tensions rise when Peter devises his own way of attracting more customers. Adult animation, featuring the voices of Seth MacFarlane and Alex Borstein.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Part one of two. Stan makes a complete mess of arranging a party for his boss - who responds by sending him to Saudi Arabia, where he and the family get an unwelcome taste of life overseas. American and Arabian social customs soon prove incompatible, and a gender war looms. With the voice of Patrick Stewart.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Part two of two. Stan begins to enjoy the power of living in a patriarchal culture, but the rest of the family members find it harder to become accustomed to Saudi Arabian life. Francine in particular struggles to adjust, and lands herself in trouble by staging a musical protest about gender roles.(n)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Buying goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Monk
programme.sub-title: Mr Monk Goes to the Circus.
programme.desc: Stottlemeyer suspects a circus animal trainer is responsible for the murder of an unpopular ringmaster - but Adrian focuses his investigation on the victim's ex-wife, a trapeze artist who is also a sharpshooter. Detective drama, starring Tony Shalhoub.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: A couple are murdered on their way to a high-school reunion, prompting Patrick to investigate the untrustworthy characters at the event. Meanwhile, a probationary agent tries to impress Gibbs and win a place on his team. Crime drama, starring Mark Harmon, with Tamer Hassan and Matt L Jones.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: The body of a saleswoman is found in the boot of a car at a luxury showroom, and an autopsy reveals she was run over. As inquiries proceed, the agents begin to suspect her boyfriend is to blame, but Jane is unconvinced and tries to draw the real murderer out into the open - only to end up destroying a Lamborghini. Crime drama, starring Simon Baker.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Cho is forced to revisit old haunts and confront his murky past as he investigates the fatal shooting of a reformed criminal who used to belong to the same gang as him. Helped by Jane, he visits the victim's workplace to question his employer - but uses such heavy-handed tactics that he finds himself facing the threat of a lawsuit.(n)

programme.title: Leverage
programme.desc: The team members target a corrupt PR agent, plotting to use his own tactics to give him 15 minutes of fame. Once they have taken him public, the con artists plan to use his new-found celebrity to expose his hidden secrets. Crime drama, starring Timothy Hutton.(n)

programme.title: Leverage
programme.desc: The team sets out to track down a lost Vincent van Gogh painting, and discovers the missing piece was at the heart of a Second World War romance between a black soldier and the white heiress he was forced to abandon. Guest starring Danny Glover.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Confidential files are leaked by an anonymous hacker, who threatens to release more unless the Navy agrees to renew a contract with a struggling shipbuilding firm. The Navy Secretary suspects the company's owner Philip Wickes is to blame, and asks NCIS to join forces with the PsyOps unit in an elaborate ruse to bring the culprit out of hiding. Meanwhile, Gibbs' colleagues begin to notice his attraction to his opposite number Samantha Ryan. Guest starring Jamie Lee Curtis.(n)

programme.desc: Vance's brother-in-law Michael Thomas is linked to the murder of a petty officer, and Gibbs is placed under pressure to clear the man's name. programme.title: Non-Stop
programme.desc: Liam Neeson reunites with Unknown director Jaume Collet-Serra) for this airborne thriller about an Air Marshal racing to stop the villain who has framed him as a hijacker during a non-stop flight from New York to London. From the moment we first meet Air Marshal Bill Marks (Neeson), it's apparent his nerves are frayed. After furtively knocking back a stiff drink in the airport parking lot, he enters the crowded terminal to board a plane bound for London. Carefully observing his fellow travelers along the way, Marks eventually ends up seated next to nervous flyer Jen (Julianne Moore), who begins to breathe easier once she's seated near a window. Later, as the plane hits cruising altitude, Marks receives a mysterious text message stating that a passenger on the flight will be killed every 20 minutes unless $150 million is deposited into a secure bank account. But the harder Marks works to identify a suspect, the deeper he implicates himself in what becomes a deadly hostage crisis unfolding at 30,000 feet over the Atlantic Ocean. When it's revealed that the account for the ransom money is in Marks' name, the FAA revokes his marshal status and the media paints him as a hijacker. As the frightened passengers begin to turn on Marks, he suspects the true culprit may not even be on the plane. And with the help of Jen and perceptive airline hostess Nancy (Michelle Dockery), he attempts to clear his name and protect the passengers by any means possible(n)

programme.title: Lifeboat
programme.desc: The survivors of a torpedoed passenger ship are set adrift in a lifeboat. As they pull out other survivors from the sea, they realise one of them is the U-boat commander responsible for the disaster. Alfred Hitchcock's Second World War drama, starring Tallulah Bankhead, Walter Slezak, William Bendix, Hume Cronyn and Henry Hull.(n)

programme.title: D-Day, the Sixth of June
programme.desc: A British colonel and an American captain board a ship heading out on a dangerous mission as part of the Normandy Landings. As the two men prepare for the battle to come, they both reminisce about their love for the same woman. Second World War drama, starring Robert Taylor, Richard Todd, Dana Wynter and Edmond O'Brien.(n)

programme.title: Unstoppable
programme.desc: A driverless train carrying a deadly cargo of toxic chemicals goes out of control. A veteran train operator and his rookie colleague set off in pursuit in their own locomotive, intending to bring it to a halt before it crashes and causes a major disaster. Action thriller, the final film from director Tony Scott, starring Denzel Washington, Chris Pine and Rosario Dawson.(n)

programme.title: The Wolverine
programme.desc: The former member of the X-Men is lured out of hiding and travels to Japan, where a dying businessman offers him the chance to give up his immortality for a normal life. He ends up robbed of his superhuman powers by a mysterious scientist and is forced to protect the tycoon's granddaughter from a secret conspiracy's assassins. Superhero adventure spin-off, starring Hugh Jackman and Tao Okamoto.(n)

programme.title: Love, Rosie
programme.desc: Rosie and Alex have been best friends since childhood, but face being separated when they head to different universities. As Rosie fears for the strain distance will place on their relationship, she begins to wonder if she wants something more than friendship from him. Romantic comedy based on Cecelia Ahern's novel Where Rainbows End, starring Lily Collins and Sam Claflin.(n)

programme.title: Heli
programme.desc: An honest man struggles to make ends meet legally in a dangerous town on the Mexican border with the US. He has to protect his family from a drug cartel after his 12-year-old sister begins a relationship with a police cadet, whose corruption brings the gangsters' wrath down on the family. Crime drama, starring Armando Espitia and Andrea Vergara. In Spanish.(n)

programme.title: The Great Sioux Uprising
programme.desc: A gang of rustlers anger the local Sioux tribe by stealing their horses and selling them to a nearby Army outpost - and as the braves gear up for a war, only one man can prevent a massacre. Western adventure, starring Jeff Chandler, Faith Domergue, Lyle Bettger and Peter Whitney.(n)

programme.title: Harvey
programme.desc: An amiable drunk claims to have a six-foot invisible rabbit named Harvey as a friend, to the horror of his social-climbing sister. Having been embarrassed by her brother once too often, she tries to have him committed to an asylum, but things do not go according to plan as her sibling's gentle nature wins over those around him. Comedy, starring James Stewart and Josephine Hull.(n)

programme.title: Damn the Defiant
programme.desc: The commander of a British warship fighting in the Napoleonic campaign faces bitter opposition from his right-hand man, a cruel and sadistic officer hated by the crew. In a battle of wills between the pair, the captain's second-in-command tries to provoke his leader's wrath by tormenting his son, an officer on the vessel. Drama, starring Alec Guinness, Dirk Bogarde and Anthony Quayle.(n)

programme.title: The Wackiest Ship in the Army
programme.desc: A naval officer is given the command of an old sailing ship to undertake a very important mission - to transport an Australian agent into enemy waters so he can spy on the Japanese. However, he finds the ship is falling apart at the seams and is manned by a crew that does not know how to sail her. Second World War comedy, with Jack Lemmon, Ricky Nelson, John Lund, Chips Rafferty and Tom Tully.(n)

programme.title: Letters to Juliet
programme.desc: A writer on holiday in Italy discovers a 50-year-old letter from a woman describing her regret at rejecting a man she was in love with. She is moved to reply, prompting the writer to turn up in person with her grandson in tow, and together they set out in search of her lost love to put things right. Romantic drama, starring Amanda Seyfried, Vanessa Redgrave and Gael Garcia Bernal.(n)

programme.title: Surrogates
programme.desc: In the future, all human activity is performed by robot duplicates mentally controlled by their owners, who live lives of complete isolation. As a mysterious killer begins murdering both humans and their doubles, an FBI agent ventures into the real world for the first time in years to catch the criminal. Sci-fi thriller, starring Bruce Willis and Radha Mitchell.(n)

programme.title: The Grey
programme.desc: Eight oil rig workers end up stranded in the middle of the Alaskan tundra when the plane flying them home crashes. With limited supplies, they must make a gruelling journey across the icy wilderness to civilisation, but their situation is made more perilous when a pack of ferocious wolves begins stalking them. Adventure, starring Liam Neeson, Frank Grillo and Dermot Mulroney.(n)

programme.title: Barefoot Contessa
programme.desc: Ina Garten demonstrates the versatility of pasta, preparing a lasagne, a pesto salad, and a penne and five-cheese special.(n)

programme.title: Barefoot Contessa
programme.desc: American writer Ina Garten creates a lunch box after receiving a gift of herbs from her friend.(n)

programme.title: Barefoot Contessa
programme.desc: Ina Garten reveals how to create delicious dishes without spending hours at the stove, preparing a chicken pie and split pea soup.(n)

programme.title: Barefoot Contessa
programme.desc: American chef and cookbook writer Ina Garten prepares raspberry shortcakes.(n)

programme.title: Anna Olson: Fresh
programme.desc: Anna shares her old family recipes, including Grandma's potato cheddar bread, peameal bacon, green bean and cheese tart made with parmesan pastry, and walnut brie strudel.(n)

programme.title: Anna Olson: Fresh
programme.desc: Anna prepares grilled salmon with balsamic onion glaze, Swiss chard with pine nuts and pan roasted garlic, and for dessert, peach frozen yoghurt and pizelle.(n)

programme.title: The Healthy Gourmet
programme.desc: Ezra and Julie throw out a life preserver to the Drag'n Angels. Can these delightful dragon boat racers win in the water and in the kitchen?.(n)

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: While the family ships cattle, Ree Drummond gets ahead with dinner and whips up a breakfast of a pancake bar with oven fried bacon, strawberries, and vanilla bean caramel sauce.(n)

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummond shares recipes for four desserts, including a white chocolate pudding, a fast raspberry fool, a quick dessert panini, and caramel apple sauce to make a sundae.(n)

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Easter on the ranch starts with a Good Friday delivery of hot cross buns to friends. Ree makes tortellini primavera and 'krispy' eggs, with a basket of crudites and a spinach dip.(n)

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: While the family works cattle, Ree Drummond fills the freezer with components ready to turn into meals at a moment's notice.(n)

programme.title: Country Show Cook Off
programme.desc: Aldo Zilli and Silvena Rowe travel to Eden Valley in Cumbria to prepare the perfect sausage roll for the Brough Annual Agricultural Show. They also meet up with Dianne Halliday from the Country Fare Bakery, where a 12-strong team produces thousands of cakes that are sold nationally and internationally.(n)

programme.title: Country Show Cook Off
programme.desc: Aldo Zilli and Silvena Rowe conclude their culinary road trip in the village of Muker in the Yorkshire Dales, where they try to impress judge Val Punchard by being creative with two items from a Dales kitchen. During their visit they meet a couple who are renowned as one of the community's finest food producers and are hoping to impress with a whisky and ginger wine cake.(n)

programme.title: Patricia Heaton Parties
programme.desc: Patricia and friends help plan a bubbly birthday brunch for singer-songwriter, Ruby Amanfu, serving up a tropical fruit parfait, muffin tin eggs benedict and cocktails.(n)

programme.title: Patricia Heaton Parties
programme.desc: Patricia Heaton lounges poolside with her friends, actress Amy Aquino and her husband, Drew McCoy, and actor Diedrich Bader and his wife, Dulcy Rogers.(n)

programme.title: Jamie at Home
programme.desc: The chef looks for things to do with pumpkins other than turning them into traditional Halloween lanterns. Recipes include a roast duck and pumpkin winter salad with Asian dressing, a soup and a lighter snack - squash fairy cakes.(n)

programme.title: Jamie at Home
programme.desc: The chef serves up home-grown winter salad dishes, including a bagna cauda, a herb omelette, and a Japanese-style tuna sashimi with sprouting herb salad and a surprising dressing. Meanwhile, gardener Brian experiments with seeds to demonstrate the full array of colourful, tasty ingredients available in the cold, dark months.(n)

programme.title: Paul Hollywood: City Bakes
programme.desc: Paul explores an area previously unknown to him, Norwegian baking. He meets a family who bake national treats and creates his version of two of Bergen's favourite bakes.(n)

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummond demonstrates how to prepare her own take on comforting home cooking.(n)

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummond demonstrates how to prepare her own take on comforting home cooking.(n)

programme.title: Country Show Cook Off
programme.desc: Eight well-known chefs set off on a road trip to compete in some of the most demanding cookery contests around the UK, with two taking part each week. programme.title: Country Show Cook Off
programme.desc: Ed Baines and Valentine Warner continue their culinary road trip, heading to London for the Lambeth Country Show to prepare an entry for the garden vegetable cake category. programme.title: Chopped Junior
programme.desc: The junior chefs deal with some seriously stinky ingredients for judges Marcus Samuelsson, former White House chef Sam Kass and blogger Ayesha Curry.(n)

programme.title: Paul Hollywood: City Bakes
programme.desc: Paul visits the city of Jerusalem, spending time with traditional bakers. Inspired, he creates his own Jerusalem bagel bread, and almond and pomegranate loaf cake.(n)

programme.title: Jamie at Home
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver rustles up more simple dishes using home-grown produce. He is joined by a Welsh sheep farmer who tackles common misconceptions about lamb and explains how the conditions the animals are kept in affects the quality of the meat.(n)

programme.title: Jamie at Home
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver prepares recipes using leeks, including pappardelle and a `concertina' squid dish. He also explains why the underrated vegetables can be a real asset in the kitchen and offers advice on how to grow and store them.(n)

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri visits a Memphis-style barbecue restaurant in Horn Lake, Mississippi, to sample their ribs, cheese fritters and burgers with pork rinds.(n)

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri visits a restaurant in Boston that serves an Italian-themed seafood dish.(n)

programme.title: Man Fire Food
programme.desc: In the Pacific Northwest, Seattle chef Renee Erickson celebrates summer by smoking meats and seafood in wine barrels that have been transformed into smokers.(n)

programme.title: Man Fire Food
programme.desc: At Ned Ludd, an American craft kitchen restaurant in Portland, chef Jason French loves to prepare food in his wood-fired oven so much that he doesn't even have a gas stove.(n)

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible

programme.title: Mystery Diners
programme.desc: A restaurant owner discovers that his manager brother is acting inappropriately with guests and asks the team to investigate.(n)

programme.title: Mystery Diners
programme.desc: Restaurant owners ask the team for help when two employees bring their personal life into the work place and begin to affect sales and disrupt morale.(n)

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri tries beef stew made from tenderloin in Arizona and in Chicago he visits a bar with burgers named after rock bands.(n)

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri enjoys a selection of international favourites, including French pate in Sacramento, Basque specialties in Idaho and Latin flavours in Florida.(n)

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible

programme.title: Mystery Diners
programme.desc: Cara is concerned about unhealthy competition between her two New Orleans restaurants, Toast and Tartine. The Mystery Diners go undercover and make a surprising discovery.(n)

programme.desc: Kristy and Sarah from Moviesets in New Orleans are concerned about theft at their event centre. Mystery Diners Rob and Ingrid book a wedding reception and make a discovery.(n)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Barefoot Contessa
programme.desc: Ina Garten helps a bride-to be who is having problems planning her rehearsal dinner. She prepares two desserts while Miguel Flores-Vianna designs two table settings.(n)

programme.title: Barefoot Contessa
programme.desc: Running a store isn't easy, and Ina should know - she ran a deli for 20 years. Ina suggests a French-inspired menu of Provencal soup, seafood and coconut madeleines for dessert as a staff thank you.(n)

programme.title: Barefoot Contessa
programme.desc: Ina Garten reveals her cooking secrets. Ina sends a food lover's delight to a friend in the city. The package consists of a beautiful fillet of beef and a perfect plum tart.(n)

programme.desc: Ezra and Julie waltz in on a group of ballroom and Latin dance instructors. Can they shake up the dance floor and the kitchen with their new menu.(n)

programme.desc: Ree Drummond confesses about her life on a plate, from beef stroganoff that she loved as a child of the 70s, to pasta ai quattro formaggi that defined her student life in LA.(n)

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
