programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Swanky Troubles. In Philadelphia, Jon hopes to insert some much-needed fizz into failing champagne bar Swanky Bubbles. Along the way, he must deal with a playboy owner, a sprawling menu and possibly the worst bar layout in America(n)

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.sub-title: There's No Crying in the Bar Business
programme.desc: There's No Crying in the Bar Business. A Georgia sports bar and its tearful owner need help addressing a widespread employee-theft issue(n)

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Owner Ousted. An owner is sent packing during the revamping of a bar(n)

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Taffer's Top 10: Toughest Rescues. A look at challenging rescues from the first three seasons(n)

programme.title: The Rundown
programme.desc: Action adventure story in which a bounty hunter, indebted to a mob boss, agrees to search for the gangster's errant son by way of repayment. His task takes him to the Amazon jungle where the son is dabbling in archaeology and, having found his quarry, the two of them join forces to locate a priceless gold idol treasured by the local population. However, a ruthlessly exploitative mining boss is also intent on finding the prized artefact(n)

programme.title: Walk Hard: The Dewey Cox Story
programme.desc: The up-and-down-and-up-again story of musician Dewey Cox, whose songs would change a nation. On his rock 'n roll spiral, Cox sleeps with 411 women, marries three times, has 22 kids and 14 step-kids, stars in his own 70s TV show, collects friends ranging from Elvis to the Beatles to a chimp, and gets addicted to - and then kicks - every drug known to man; but despite it all, Cox grows into a national icon and eventually earns the love of a good woman - longtime backup singer Darlene(n)

programme.title: O Brother, Where Art Thou?
programme.desc: The Coen Brothers' deliriously weird, Oscar-nominated film, improbably (and very loosely) based on The Odyssey. George Clooney, John Turturro and Tim Blake Nelson are three chain-gang convicts who make a break for freedom when Clooney finds out his wife is going to re-marry(n)

programme.title: 2017 CMT Music Awards
programme.desc: Charles Esten hosts the 2017 celebration from Nashville's Music City Center. Scheduled to perform: Luke Bryan; Brett Eldredge; Miranda Lambert; Thomas Rhett; and Blake Shelton(n)

programme.title: O Brother, Where Art Thou?
programme.desc: The Coen Brothers' deliriously weird, Oscar-nominated film, improbably (and very loosely) based on The Odyssey. George Clooney, John Turturro and Tim Blake Nelson are three chain-gang convicts who make a break for freedom when Clooney finds out his wife is going to re-marry(n)

programme.title: I Am Wrath
programme.desc: An engineer with a dark past seeks revenge for his wife's murder in this gritty action thriller, and teams with an old friend to locate the killers after the crooked cops assigned to the case fail to bring them to justice(n)

programme.title: Eloise
programme.desc: A group of friends explore an abandoned mental hospital in order to retrieve a death certificate that one of them needs to claim an inheritance. However, things quickly go awry when they discover that the institution is haunted by sinister forces(n)

programme.title: Jarhead
programme.desc: Jake Gyllenhaal gives a dead-on-target performance as a marine followed from boot camp to his assignment as an elite sniper during Operation Desert Storm. The superb film is based on the memoir of ex-leatherneck Anthony Swofford (Gyllenhaal). Sam Mendes ("American Beauty") directed from a script by William Broyles Jr. Jamie Foxx, Peter Sarsgaard, Chris Cooper, Lucas Black, Brianne Davis, Jacob Vargas(n)

programme.title: What's Eating Gilbert Grape
programme.desc: In spite of these responsibilities, the young man attempts to lead a normal existence, until he meets a woman passing through town and life becomes even more complicated. Based on the novel by Peter Hedges(n)

programme.title: Deep Impact
programme.desc: Apocalyptic thriller in which life on Earth is threatened by a rogue comet. When a reporter in pursuit of a Washington sex scandal is arrested by the FBI, she discovers that the story is an inconsequential part of a huge cover-up. But she soon finds herself in possession of the biggest story in the history of mankind: the planet will be destroyed in one year, unless a risky outer-space mission can deflect a comet(n)

programme.title: The Great Raid
programme.desc: . In the waning days of World War II, General Douglas MacArthur chose to make good on a pledge that he made in 1942 -- that he would return to the Philippines after he and his troops were forced to retreat. However, MacArthur's determination was more than a matter of pride. Over 500 American soldiers were being held in Cabanatuan, a notoriously brutal prisoner of war camp in the Philippines operated by the Japanese army, and MacArthur wanted to see to it that they made it home(n)

programme.title: The Big Hit
programme.desc: A beleaguered hit man and his associates kidnap a rich industrialist's daughter, but their plan backfires when she turns out to be the godchild of their boss(n)

programme.title: American Gods
programme.desc: A Murder of Gods. The New Gods' show of force sends Shadow and Mr. Wednesday on the run and in search of a safe haven in the company of one of Mr. Wednesday's oldest friends, Vulcan, God of the Fire and the Forge(n)

programme.title: Hollow Man
programme.desc: Kevin Bacon stars in a visually stunning sci-fi thriller as a scientist who discovers the secret of invisibility. Having had some success with animals, he decides to test the serum on himself but its effects prove irreversible and the invisible man is driven insane, taking his wrath out on his ex-girlfriend and her current love-interest(n)

programme.title: American Gods
programme.desc: A Murder of Gods. The New Gods' show of force sends Shadow and Mr. Wednesday on the run and in search of a safe haven in the company of one of Mr. Wednesday's oldest friends, Vulcan, God of the Fire and the Forge(n)

programme.title: For Love of the Game
programme.desc: A baseball legend almost finished with his distinguished career at the age of thirty-seven has one last chance to prove who he is, what he is capable of and win the heart of the woman he has loved for the past four years. As he pitches that night, he must decide whether to accept the trade or quit the game he loves, and between innings, he recalls meeting Jane, their first date, happy times, miscommunication, and what may be a final break. Meanwhile, with Vin Scully announcing, one Yankee batter after another fails to reach first base. Can Billy pitch a perfect game, and if so, what does it matter if he loses Jane?(n)

programme.title: American Gods
programme.desc: A Murder of Gods. The New Gods' show of force sends Shadow and Mr. Wednesday on the run and in search of a safe haven in the company of one of Mr. Wednesday's oldest friends, Vulcan, God of the Fire and the Forge(n)

programme.title: Idiocracy
programme.desc: An Army grunt is cryogenically frozen as part of a military experiment, but is forgotten for 500 years. He wakes up to an almost unrecognisable world(n)

programme.title: Deep Impact

programme.title: Vertical Limit
programme.desc: After this stunning opening, the action switches to the Himalayas, where tycoon Elliott Vaughn has financed an expedition that will take him to the summit of K2-the world's second highest mountain. Annie is one of Elliott's party. In the face of a threatening storm, Elliott recklessly insists the climb should continue. The storm duly arrives and decimates the expedition, leaving Elliott and Annie stranded. Peter leads a group of climbers-including the grizzled Montgomery Wick and a French-Canadian nurse in a rescue attempt(n)

programme.title: When the Bough Breaks
programme.desc: A married couple who are eager to have a baby hire a seemingly stable young woman to be their surrogate. However, the latter soon becomes infatuated with the husband, and is willing to do whatever it takes to seduce him(n)

programme.title: The Brothers Grimsby
programme.desc: In this unbelievably raunchy comedy, a British superspy is forced to team up with his long-lost brother, a working-class soccer hooligan, in order to defeat a terrorist organization(n)

programme.title: Coming Home
programme.desc: After a man is released from a labour camp during the last days of the Cultural Revolution, he returns home to find his wife has amnesia and does not recognise him(n)

programme.title: The Object of My Affection
programme.desc: When unmarried Jennifer Aniston becomes pregnant she has to choose either her pathetic boyfriend or gay roommate as a potential dad(n)

programme.title: In Her Shoes
programme.desc: Curtis Hanson's film stars Cameron Diaz as Maggie Feller: blonde, feckless and shallow, and Toni Collette as her sister Rose, a top-notch lawyer who is insecure in her personal life. The pair reluctantly share Rose's apartment until Maggie sleeps with the man Rose hoped would be her boyfriend(n)

programme.title: The Lookout
programme.desc: Writer-director Scott Frank, who scripted the screen adaptations of Elmore Leonard's "Get Shorty" and "Out of Sight," scores a winner with this gripping noirish caper saga. Joseph Gordon-Levitt stars as a bank janitor who falls in with thieves who are planning to rob his workplace. When he has second thoughts about participating, they ratchet up the pressure with threats to some innocent outsiders. Jeff Daniels, Matthew Goode, Isla Fisher, Carla Gugino, Bruce McGill, Sergio Di Zio(n)

programme.title: The Meddler
programme.desc: After the death of her husband, a woman named Marnie relocates to L.A. to be closer to her daughter Lori, a Hollywood screenwriter. While Lori frets about her mum's smothering ways, Marnie keeps getting involved in the lives of others(n)

programme.title: Jumanji
programme.desc: Two children discover a mysterious board game in their attic. As they roll the dice, out pops Alan -a man who has been trapped inside for 26 years - and a jungle-full of wild animals. Family(n)

programme.title: Fever Pitch
programme.desc: Nick Hornby's acclaimed memoir about one man's struggle to balance his love of a woman and his love for soccer was the basis of a well-reviewed British film in 1997, and now gets a Americanized rewrite with this picture, in which the game is changed from soccer to baseball. Ben (Jimmy Fallon) is a high-school teacher who meets Lindsay (Drew Barrymore), who has a successful career in business. Ben and Lindsay don't appear to have much in common on the surface, but they hit it off and are soon involved in a serious romance. But when spring rolls around, Lindsay becomes aware of the true love of Ben's life -- the Boston Red Sox. Despite the team's lamentable record, Ben has been a fiercely loyal Red Sox fan since childhood, and Lindsay finds it hard to compete with his passion for baseball, while Ben is forced to choose between the obsessions of his youth and the enthusiasms of a responsible adult. Fever Pitch was shot in part in Boston during the 2004 baseball season, which to the surprise of the filmmakers saw the Red Sox winning baseball's world series for the first time since 1918(n)

programme.title: Freaks of Nature
programme.desc: A town full of humans, zombies, and vampires living in co-existence are thrust into an all-out war when aliens invade. Now, three teenagers must defeat the newest visitors to restore the peace(n)

programme.desc: After the death of her husband, a woman named Marnie relocates to L.A. to be closer to her daughter Lori, a Hollywood screenwriter. While Lori frets about her mum's smothering ways, Marnie keeps getting involved in the lives of others(n)

programme.desc: An old and forgotten game develops magical powers in this fantasy for the whole family(n)

programme.title: Honey
programme.desc: Jessica Alba stars as Honey Daniels, a dancer and choreographer who struggles to get by until she gets her one big break, but soon she realises that it's too good to be true(n)

programme.title: Honey 2
programme.desc: Recently released from juvenile detention after a brush with the law, talented dancer Maria Ramirez has returned to her gritty Bronx roots to rebuild her life. When a rare night out at a local dance club gives her an opportunity to let loose, Maria's killer moves catch the eye of Brandon, a Rec Center volunteer who invites her to help him transform a group of gifted but undisciplined dancers into a competitive crew. This might be her big chance at creating a new and meaningful life(n)

programme.title: Friday After Next
programme.desc: Ice Cube co-wrote and stars in this second sequel to the 1995 comedy "Friday," which once again follows a day in the life of two cousins in Los Angeles. This time, Craig (Ice Cube) and Day-Day (Mike Epps) are robbed by Santa Claus on Christmas Eve, and the not-so-jolly old elf has made off with their rent money. John Witherspoon, Bebe Drake(n)

programme.title: The People vs. Larry Flynt
programme.desc: Intriguing portrait of porn publisher Larry Flynt, who won a First Amendment case before the U.S. Supreme Court(n)

programme.title: I Saw the Light
programme.desc: This deeply personal biopic of country-music legend Hank Williams chronicles his tumultuous life—from his marriage to aspiring singer Audrey Mae Sheppard to his residency at the Grand Ole Opry—as he struggles with alcoholism and addiction(n)

programme.title: Freaks of Nature
programme.desc: A town full of humans, zombies, and vampires living in co-existence are thrust into an all-out war when aliens invade. Now, three teenagers must defeat the newest visitors to restore the peace(n)

programme.title: Walk the Line
programme.desc: From his early years on an Arkansas cotton farm through to superstardom as a country music singer, this moving film charts the fascinating life of Johnny Cash(n)

programme.title: The Santa Clause 3: The Escape Clause
programme.desc: The third instalment of the popular holiday series picks up with Everyman-turned-Santa-Claus Scott Calvin just days before Christmas. Not only is toy production behind schedule, but another special delivery is on its way: Scott's wife, Carol/Mrs. Claus is pregnant. To add to the pressure, Carol's parents are coming for a visit, prompting an emergency make-over for Santa's Village to protect Scott's true identity..(n)

programme.title: Ice Age: The Meltdown
programme.desc: In this hilarious sequel, Manny, Sid, and Diego discover the Ice Age is ending, and join everybody to journey to higher ground. En route they discover Manny isn't the last woolly mammoth(n)

programme.title: Paul Blart: Mall Cop
programme.desc: Comedy about Paul Blart, a man who has missed out on his dream of becoming a respected cop and is settling for patrolling the local mall with delusions of grandeur. He takes his role very seriously, much to the chagrin of his colleagues, but he gets his chance to impress when a group of thieves raid the mall(n)

programme.title: Wild Hogs
programme.desc: Frustrated with their lives, four middle-aged men decide to hit the open road and embark on a motorcycle road trip to California. Trouble strikes when they run into the Del Fuegos, a fierce biker gang, and a series of unfortunate incidents leave the Wild Hogs on the run from the Del Fuegos in New Mexico. Do they have what it takes to stand up to their pursuers? Starring Tim Allen, John Travolta, Martin Lawrence, William H Macy, Ray Liotta, Marisa Tomei(n)

programme.title: I Saw the Light
programme.desc: This deeply personal biopic of country-music legend Hank Williams chronicles his tumultuous life—from his marriage to aspiring singer Audrey Mae Sheppard to his residency at the Grand Ole Opry—as he struggles with alcoholism and addiction(n)

programme.title: Walk the Line
programme.desc: From his early years on an Arkansas cotton farm through to superstardom as a country music singer, this moving film charts the fascinating life of Johnny Cash(n)

programme.title: Money Monster
programme.desc: A TV stock-market guru and his producer are held hostage during a live broadcast by a man who lost his life's savings due to the host's advice. The captor soon forces the pair to probe a global conspiracy in this intense, timely thriller(n)

programme.title: Drugstore Cowboy
programme.desc: Highly acclaimed drama about a junkie, Bob Hughes, and his 'crew' of fellow addicts, who drift through 1970s North America robbing hospitals and pharmacies to feed their increasingly large habits. When one of his sidekicks dies, Bob decides to go straight - but his girlfriend has problems following him into the drug-free world. The film features a memorable cameo from William S Burroughs(n)

programme.title: Spread
programme.desc: A ¿serial-womanizer¿, Nikki (Ashton Kutcher) moves from one wealthy woman to another and operates by his own set of rules. He¿s also homeless, car-less, amoral, and good-looking. His latest conquest is Samantha (Anne Heche), an attorney whose house overlooks L.A. But in Nikki's world of money, power, and fame, true stardom is fleeting, since he¿s beginning to develop actual feelings for a pretty young waitress. Little does he know that he's about to fall victim to his own seductive game(n)

programme.title: The Filth and the Fury
programme.desc: Although their career lasted a bit less than two years, few rock bands have made a more dramatic impact than the Sex Pistols, who quickly rose to international infamy as the best-known British punk band, then fell apart shortly after their first American tour in a tempest of drugs, ego, and infighting. Manager Malcolm McLaren began making a film about the group while they were at the height of their fame, but by the time McLaren and director Julien Temple completed The Great Rock 'n' Roll Swindle, the group's best-known member, bassist Sid Vicious, was dead, and the remaining Pistols -- vocalist Johnny Rotten (aka John Lydon), guitarist Steve Jones, drummer Paul Cook, and original bassist Glen Matlock were in litigation against McLaren and refused to participate. In 1998, Temple began working with the group's surviving members (who reunited for a brief tour in 1996) for this definitive documentary of the Pistols' career, which combines new interviews with footage of legendary live performances (such as their infamous Jubilee Day show on a ship sailing past the Houses of Parliament), as well as newsreels of the chaos that followed in their wake, including the TV appearance that changed them overnight from a little-known cult band to national pariahs(n)

programme.title: Wind Chill
programme.desc: Two college students share a ride home for the holidays. When they break down on a deserted stretch of road, they're preyed upon by the ghosts of people who have died there(n)

programme.title: Desperate Measures
programme.desc: Academy Award nominee Andy Garcia and Michael Keaton star in this gripping drama about a father who must go to great lengths to save his critically ill son. Frank Connor (Garcia) is a San Francisco police officer who lives to uphold the law, but is forced to take desperate measures in order to find a comparable bone marrow donor for his son. Peter McCabe (Keaton) is the boy's perfect DNA match. He's also a homicidal, yet charismatic sociopath serving a life sentence in a maximum-security prison. When McCabe escapes on his way to the hospital for the transplant, he leaves a trail of dead and wounded in his wake, and the hospital becomes a bloody battleground. In the ensuing cat-and-mouse game, Connor finds that he and McCabe are more alike than he imagined, since McCabe's survival represents his son's only hope(n)

programme.title: What Dreams May Come
programme.desc: Robin Williams stars in Vincent Ward's visually sumptuous story of a man whose love is so strong, it can conquer the after life. Williams and Annabella Sciorra are gloriously happy until their two children are killed in an accident. Somehow, they overcome the despair but when Williams is killed in an accident too, Sciorra can take no more pain and commits suicide. He awakes in a paradise but learns that her spirit is locked in perdition and can only be freed if he undertakes the perilous journey to find her and release her. With Cuba Gooding Jnr and Max Von Sydow. Subtitles(n)

programme.title: The White Princess
programme.desc: Old Curses. Lizzie battles new demons and old curses, while a final confrontation with the pretender exposes King Henry's weaknesses(n)

programme.title: Dreaming of Joseph Lees
programme.desc: This drama takes place in Somerset, England in 1958. Eva is a twenty-year-old woman who fantasizes about travel, painting, classic books, and the attention of Joseph Lees, her second cousin, with whom she fell in love as a girl. Joseph, whom she has not seen for four years, is the only member of the family who has managed to get away from the stale domestic cycle. He has recently been injured in a truck accident and Eva imagines herself curing his wounds. She conceals her obsession from everyone except her sister, the precocious Janie, who is twelve years old. Reality is far away from Eva's dreams. Her artistic endeavors are confined to a local drawing class; she works for a meager salary at a dirty sawmill and the only male around to appreciate her female charm is the local pig farmer, Harry Flyte. Harry's sister Maria is anxious to marry off her brother so that she can be free to do as she pleases. Eva moves in with Harry, but when she meets Joseph at a family gathering, the old flame is rekindled. However, Harry is not so easy to get rid of. Dreaming of Joseph Lees is a family drama and the first feature of Eric Styles(n)

programme.title: Great Expectations
programme.desc: Contemporary take on the classic Dickens novel from Alfonso Cuarón, starring Ethan Hawke, Gwyneth Paltrow, Chris Cooper, Anne Bancroft and Robert De Niro(n)

programme.title: Ten Thousand Saints
programme.desc: 10,000 Saints is a coming-of-age drama from directors Shari Springer Berman and Robert Pulcini (American Splendor) set in 1988, centering around a Vermont teenager named Jude (Asa Butterfield) who moves to Manhattan with his drug-dealing father, Les (Ethan Hawke), with whom he has a strained relationship. On the heels of a night of partying that leads to his best friend dying from a drug overdose, Jude gets closer to new friend Eliza (Hailee Steinfeld) and his deceased friend's half-brother (Emile Hirsch), all while falling deeper into the city's burgeoning punk scene and its straight-edge fans. The film co-stars Emily Mortimer as Les' girlfriend, and Julianne Nicholson as Jude's adoptive mother(n)

programme.title: The Sound and the Fury
programme.desc: James Franco directs this adaptation of William Faulkner's The Sound and the Fury, the writer's tale of the Compson family, a once wealthy Southern clan devolving into obscurity. Tim Blake Nelson portrays the patriarch, a boozy lawyer who oversees the lives of his children with cynical monologues delivered through an alcoholic haze. Quentin, the oldest child, goes to Harvard, but he's very close with Caddy, the only daughter in the family who has a child out of wedlock. Second son Jason attempts to rule the family with an iron fist, but he's full of resentment towards Caddy's bastard child. All of them attempt to care for the developmentally disabled Benjy (Franco). Franco employs a fractured approach to the narrative in an attempt to capture Faulkner's distinctive prose style. The Sound and the Fury screened at the 2014 Toronto International Film Festival(n)

programme.title: Layer Cake
programme.desc: Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels producer Matthew Vaughn kicked off his directorial career with this crime thriller starring Daniel Craig, Sienna Miller and Michael Gambon. Craig plays an unnamed gentleman drug dealer (well, all things are relative in his line of work) who, landed with an astonishingly lucrative job, spies his opportunity to retire relatively unscathed from the business. However, before he can do so, his boss Jimmy Price asks him to track down the missing daughter of another gangster, Eddie Temple, and as Temple's of an even nastier temperament than Price it's not a request he can easily refuse. And once he embarks on his task, complications begin to stack upon each other in much the manner of the confection that gives the film its title - though rather than some lovely sponge, cream and berries, this one consists of brutal henchmen, drug deals gone bad and violent bloodletting(n)

programme.desc: Single mother Maggie (Sarah Jessica Parker) drags her rebellious daughter Summer (Rosie Day) on a trip to a Tuscan village that the former visited when she was younger. Struck with a sense of duty, Tom agrees despite one dilemma: he can't remember who the classmate is(n)

programme.title: Broken Arrow
programme.desc: In a nondescript boxing ring, two fighters square off. Suddenly, fists in boxing gloves, they rush at each other - and us - with explosive force. The intensity of the combatants' blows belies the fact that they are friends engaging in a spirited round of fisticuffs. Vic Deakins, the older and more experienced of the two is definitely in control, giving his friend Riley Hale an impressive, if painful, boxing lesson. In addition to having a mentor/protégé relationship in the ring, the two are colleagues -- crack military pilots who are about to be handed a choice assignment to fly the top-secret B-3 Stealth bomber on a test run. Their cargo: two nuclear warheads(n)

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: No Time like the Past. Disillusioned with the present, Paul Driscoll (Dana Andrews) builds a time machine and heads to the past, hoping to correct mankind's mistakes. Failing spectacularly in this endeavor, he elects to take up permanent residence in the small town of Homeville, Indiana, circa 1881, where he hopes to live out his life in quiet contentment. Alas, despite his herculean efforts not to alter the course of history, that is just what he ends up doing. As originally written by Rod Serling, this hour-long Twilight Zone episode opened with a lengthy philosophical discussion between Driscoll and his mentor Dr. Harvey. This was adjudged too dull for TV consumption, thus a new opening was dreamed up wherein Driscoll was shown trying to prevent the sinking of the Lusitania and the rise of Hitler's Nazi Party. Accordingly, the role of Dr. Harvey was diminished, obliging proposed costar Joseph Schildkraut to drop out of the episode. The final version of "No Time Like the Past" premiered March 7, 1963(n)

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: The Howling Man. Adapted by Charles Beaumont from his own short story, this is one of a handful of Twilight Zone episodes that can truly be described as terrifying. Told in flashback, it's the story of David Ellington (H.M. Wynant), who, while on a walking tour of Europe in the 1930s, is forced to take shelter in a non-religious monastery. Despite the warnings of Brother Jerome (John Carradine), Ellington takes pity on the bearded, wild-eyed "howling man" (Robin Hughes) who is locked in a basement cell. All hell breaks loose (literally!) when the foolhardy Ellington releases the prisoner. The episode's finale was designed to deliberately invoke memories of a similar sequence in the 1935 theatrical feature Werewolf of London. "The Howling Man" originally aired November 4, 1960(n)

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Nick of Time. Future Star Trek captain William Shatner stars as Don Carter, who is on his honeymoon with his perky young wife Pat (Patricia Breslin). Stranded in a small town while their car is being repaired, Don and Pat wander into a diner, where their attention is diverted by a curious fortune-telling machine. Out of amusement, they begin feeding coins into the machine -- and before long, Don has become "hooked" on the sinister device. Stafford Repp, who later played Chief O'Hara on TV's Batman, appears as a mechanic. Written by Richard Matheson, "Nick of Time" made its Twilight Zone debut on November 18, 1960(n)

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: The Trouble with Templeton. The past and present collide with poignant results in this handsomely mounted Twilight Zone episode. Brian Aherne stars as aging Broadway matinee idol Booth Templeton, who is unable to give his full attention to his latest play because of his obsession with the past in general and his late wife Laura (Pippa Scott) in particular. Miraculously, Templeton is transported back to the 1920s for a reunion with his beloved Laura, which proves to be an eye-opener in more ways than one. Future film director Sydney Pollack is cast here as an abrasive stage director named Willis, a character whom scriptwriter E. Jack Neuman and director Buzz Kulik patterned after pioneer live-TV producer Fred Coe. "The Trouble with Templeton" was first telecast on December 9, 1960(n)

programme.title: Impact
programme.desc: 正当人们兴致勃勃地欣赏万年一遇的巨型流星雨时，一颗躲藏在流星群中的棕矮星突然冲向月球。巨大的冲击力引起恐怖的爆炸，月球表面的部分区域瞬间碎裂成岩屑。碎片很快坠入地球的大气层，所及之处陷入一片火海。虽然损失并不算大，但极度恐慌的情绪还是在全世界范围内迅速蔓延开来。与此同时，地球上出现了一系列异常--最开始只是手机信号消失、不规则的静电干扰、奇怪的潮汐现象等不太惹人注目的现象，但事情显然并不这么简单。(n)

programme.title: Seinfeld
programme.desc: The Caddy. When George locks his keys in his car and has to leave it in the parking lot overnight, his bosses think he is the last one to leave at night and the first one to arrive in the morning, leading George to believe he has found the perfect way to feign diligence. Meanwhile, Kramer begins turning to his caddy for advice both on and off the links, and Elaine's attempt at a less-than-subtle hint yields unfavorable results when she gives a bra as a gift to a woman who never wears them. Brenda Strong guest stars as Sue Ellen, the braless woman, and Phil Morris once again reprises his role as Kramer's attorney, Jackie Chiles. Originally airing January 25, 1996, "The Caddy" was the 12th episode of the show's seventh season(n)

programme.title: Seinfeld
programme.desc: The Seven. After Susan's friends scoff at George's suggestion of the name Soda for their unborn child, George becomes irate when he learns that the couple is considering naming the baby Seven, the name George plans on naming his child some day. Meanwhile, Elaine finds herself with a stiff neck after pulling a bicycle off the wall at a sporting goods store, Kramer begins keeping track of the things he borrows from Jerry, and Jerry notices that his new girlfriend appears to be wearing the same outfit every time he sees her. Ken Campbell and Shannon Holt guest star. Originally airing February 1, 1996, "The Seven" was the 13th episode of the show's seventh season(n)

programme.title: Seinfeld
programme.desc: The Cadillac. After thinking about how much money he makes, Jerry decides to do something nice for his parents and buys them a Cadillac. Meanwhile, Kramer attempts to get revenge on the cable guy, George considers making a date with actress Marisa Tomei (despite his engagement to Susan), and Elaine suddenly shows interest in Jerry after learning of his wealth. Marisa Tomei guest stars as herself. Airing February 8, 1996, "The Cadillac, Part 1" was originally the first half of a one-hour episode that was split into two for syndication(n)

programme.desc: Profiling Brian Coll, from Omagh, Co Tyrone, whose career was rooted in Ireland's golden show-band era. The programme covers his early work with local ensembles such as the Polka Dots and the Plattermen, through to forming his own country band, the Buckaroos. It also examines his passion for motorbike racing and numerous biking accidents - including one in 1989 in which he suffered a severe brain haemorrhage, causing serious memory loss and forcing him to relearn all the words of his songs.(n)

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Wrestling with Demons. Prue (Shannen Doherty) is put in the position of saving Tom Peters (Marco Sanchez), whom she dated in high school, from being recruited by demons. Alas, when Tom is forced to kill a man, Prue's sisters, Piper (Holly Marie Combs) and Phoebe (Holly Marie Combs), may be obliged to destroy him. The crisis culminates in an illegal wrestling match, involving the Halliwell girls and several fearsome-looking grapplers (all played by genuine stars of the WCW). Elsewhere, Phoebe has a lot of 'splainin' to do about Cole's phony death. And Leo (Brian Krause) loses Piper's engagement ring(n)

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Bride and Gloom. Cole returns to town and contacts Phoebe through her television set. Phoebe finds him in the tomb where she 'vanquished' him and tells him she never wants to see him again. Piper is planning her wedding with wedding planners and guests and everything, while Leo tries to convince her that they should probably keep is small and private. Prue expresses her mild jealousy at her younger sister getting married before her, and is shortly thereafter kidnapped by a dark priestess and married against her will to a warlock named Zile. Phoebe turns to Cole and his underground evil connections for help with finding Prue. Prue's marriage turns her evil, and the evil infects her sisters and the Book of Shadows as well. Phoebe and Piper have a great time being evil, and they gleefully torture the wedding planners and kill Leo. Phoebe tries to get evil with Cole, but he just tells her where Prue is and gets away from her. The dark priestess steals the Book of Shadows and tries to use it against the Charmed evil Ones. She gets Prue to fight her own sisters, but when Piper and Phoebe kill off Zile, they all go back to being good and quickly vanquish the priestess. When they go back to being good, they reverse the evil that they did and luckily Leo is okay. Piper finally agrees that they should keep the wedding small and private. Phoebe thanks Cole for his help but tells him they still can't be together(n)

programme.title: Charmed
programme.sub-title: The Good, the Bad and the Cursed
programme.desc: The Good, the Bad and the Cursed. While visiting a Western ghost town with her father, Victor (James Read), Phoebe (Alyssa Milano) begins suffering the pains incurred over 100 years before by a young Indian named Beau Lightfeather (Michael Greyeyes). While investigating this phenomenon, Phoebe and her sisters are locked into a time loop, forcing them to live through the same day over and over. It is up to Prue (Shannen Doherty) and the purportedly "reformed" demon Cole (Julian McMahon) to travel back in time to set things right. Meanwhile, Leo (Brian Krause) reveals his Whitelighter status to Victor -- who is none too pleased, recalling as he does that his own wife, Patty, had had a romance with another Whitelighter named Sam(n)

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The End in the Beginning. Returning for a fourth season, Bones is a scientific crime drama with plenty of chemistry. Inspired by real-life forensic anthropologist and bestselling writer Kathy Reichs, the series follows bone-studying novelist Dr Temperance Brennan (Emily Deschanel) who is called on by the law to assist with murder cases. To her endless irritation, she is teamed with Special Agent Seeley Booth (David Boreanaz) of the FBI's Homicide Investigations Unit. The pair use their individual skills to piece together puzzling murders, and their individual personalities to spar off each other. Also starring Michaela Conlin as Brennan's best friend Angela Montenegro, Eric Millegan as assistant Zack Addy, TJ Thyne as insect expert Dr Jack Hodgins and Jonathan Adams as Brennan's boss Dr Daniel Goodman(n)

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Harbingers in a Fountain. In the fifth-season premiere, work resumes for Brennan, who's back from a dig in Guatemala, and Booth, anxious to return to duty six weeks after his brain surgery, when Angela's psychic suggests there are bodies buried under a fountain in Washington, DC(n)

programme.title: Daddy's Little Girls
programme.desc: Tyler Perry wrote and directed this romantic and heartwarming comedy-drama about a divorcé (Idris Elba) who falls for the lawyer (Gabrielle Union) helping him to win custody of his three young daughters after his ex-wife moves in with a drug dealer. Louis Gossett Jr., Tasha Smith, Tracee Ellis Ross, Malinda Williams(n)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Madea Goes to Jail
programme.desc: Tyler Perry transitions another one of his hit plays to the big screen with this adaptation of +Madea Goes to Jail. The successful filmmaker stars once again as the mischief-prone older woman whose exploits this time lead her to jail, where she befriends and reforms a prostitute named Candy (The Cosby Show's Keshia Knight Pulliam)(n)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's I Can Do Bad All by Myself
programme.desc: An irresponsible, alcoholic singer must care for her niece and nephews after the teenagers commit a crime in this heartfelt drama. Meanwhile, a Mexican immigrant helps her and attempts to win her heart, but the turmoil continues due to her relationship with her married boyfriend(n)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Madea's Big Happy Family
programme.desc: This quirky and inspirational comedy-drama follows Madea (Tyler Perry), a tough-as-nails grandmother, as she rallies the family together despite their preoccupation with their own woes when an alarming medical diagnosis demands their attention(n)

programme.title: Animal Kingdom
programme.desc: Eat What You Kill. A risky heist misfires and the boys blame Smurf, sending shock waves through the family, in the Season 2 premiere. Also: Baz deals with being a single parent; and Deran plans for the future(n)
